mapper.insert: insert into t_restaurant (id, restaurantName, shortName, tel, adderss, description, url, beginDate, account, taxRegistrationCertificate, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{restaurantname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adderss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begindate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxregistrationcertificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_restaurant set restaurantName = #{restaurantname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shortName = #{shortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adderss = #{adderss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beginDate = #{begindate,jdbcType=DATE}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taxRegistrationCertificate = #{taxregistrationcertificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delFlag = #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, lastSubTime = #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, restaurantName, shortName, tel, adderss, description, url, beginDate, account, taxRegistrationCertificate, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy from t_restaurant where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
